item.hbm_m.meter.geiger_counter.name: GEIGER COUNTER
item.hbm_m.template_folder.desc: Machine Templates: Paper + Dye$Fluid IDs: Iron Plate + Dye$Press Stamps: Flat Stamp$Siren Tracks: Insulator + Steel Plate
text.autoconfig.hbm_m.option.debugRender: Show debug render in survival mode
Show debug renderer in survival mode
text.autoconfig.hbm_m.option.enableChunk: If disabled, chunk radiation is always 0
text.autoconfig.hbm_m.option.enableDebug: If disabled, deep logging of game events will be active. Do not enable unless you experience problems
Whether radiation debug render is enabled (F3)
text.autoconfig.hbm_m.option.enableRadFo: Enables/disables the radioactive fog particle effect in chunks with high radiation levels.
text.autoconfig.hbm_m.option.enableRadia: If disabled, all radiation is turned off (chunks, items)
text.autoconfig.hbm_m.option.fogRad.@Too: Chunk radiation for fog to appear (WIP)
text.autoconfig.hbm_m.option.hazmatMod.@: Protection for regular hazmat suit (1.0 = no protection)
text.autoconfig.hbm_m.option.infoToastOf: Distance from the left edge of the screen.
Distance from the top edge of the screen.
text.autoconfig.hbm_m.option.maxPlayerRa: Maximum radiation the player can accumulate
text.autoconfig.hbm_m.option.minRadDecay: Minimum decay per tick in chunk
text.autoconfig.hbm_m.option.obstruction:
If enabled, blocks obstructing multiblock placement
will be highlighted with a red box.

Sets the opacity of the highlight box's fill.
0% = Invisible, 100% = Solid.
The duration in seconds for how long the obstruction highlight will be visible.
text.autoconfig.hbm_m.option.radChunkSpr: How much radiation spreads to neighboring chunks
text.autoconfig.hbm_m.option.radDamage.@: Damage per tick when above threshold (Will be reworked)
text.autoconfig.hbm_m.option.radDamageTh: Player starts taking damage above this value
text.autoconfig.hbm_m.option.radDecay.@T: How fast player radiation decays per tick
text.autoconfig.hbm_m.option.radFogChanc: The chance for fog particles to spawn in a suitable chunk per second. Calculated as 1 in X. A lower value means more frequent fog.
text.autoconfig.hbm_m.option.radFogThres: The minimum ambient radiation level in a chunk for the fog effect to appear.
text.autoconfig.hbm_m.option.radSourceIn: Influence of radioactive blocks in chunk
text.autoconfig.hbm_m.option.radiationPi: Shows random, flickering pixels on the screen when the player is exposed to incoming radiation.
The probability (from 0.0 to 1.0) that a newly appeared pixel will be green instead of white. E.g., 0.1 = 10% chance.
The maximum number of pixels that can be on the screen at once when the effect is at its peak intensity. Affects performance on weak systems.
The minimum incoming radiation (RAD/s) required for the visual interference effect to appear.
The level of incoming radiation (RAD/s) at which the pixel effect reaches its maximum strength (maximum number of pixels).
The maximum time (in ticks) a single pixel will stay on the screen. A random value between min and max lifetime is chosen for each pixel.
The minimum time (in ticks) a single pixel will stay on the screen. 20 ticks = 1 second.
text.autoconfig.hbm_m.option.usePrismSys: Use PRISM system for chunk radiation (WIP)
text.autoconfig.hbm_m.option.vatsRenderD: Max distance for mob health highlighting. Higher values increase range but reduce performance.
text.autoconfig.hbm_m.option.worldRadEff: Enables/disables world destruction effects from high radiation (block replacement, vegetation decay, etc.).
The number of random block checks in an affected chunk per tick. Affects the speed of destruction. Higher values may impact performance.
The maximum depth (in blocks) from the surface that world destruction effects can reach.
The maximum speed multiplier for world destruction at peak radiation. 1 = no scaling, 4 = can be up to 4 times faster. Max value - 10x
The minimum ambient radiation level in a chunk at which world destruction effects begin.
text.autoconfig.hbm_m.title: Radiation Settings (HBM Modernized)
tooltip.hbm_m.creative_battery_desc: Provides an infinite amount of power
